title: AFK Ban
body: I was thresh{{champion:412}}  in a game with my adc a kalista (blood moon skin) and around the 7 minutes into the game, I start to have my frames drop. My ADC{{champion:429}}  said that I was lagging her as well. I went to fountain to fix my lag issue but, my frames said it was a 00 and I tried to exit out of my game to restart it. Next thing you now it takes about 15 minutes to get out and restart my game. The game thought I was afk and game me an unfair 20 minute ban or 5 games. If someone can help me with this I would gladly appreciate it.

replies.body:
A 5-game penalty *cannot* be added to your account as a result of a single game. This penalty is only added to your account after a recent and consistent trend of disconnections occurs. I'm unable to modify or remove your penalty, but we can troubleshoot your FPS issue together.

FPS Issues can be caused by a number of factors, however, the most common causes are display driver or hardware issues. We've consolidated the most common solutions in our [FPS Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting), so I'd recommend giving those a go. Let me know if this helped.
